ru.dest.library.task

Class TaskManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.dest.library.task.TaskManager

  • public class TaskManager
extends Object

    Class for calling parallel tasks and guarantees that all tasks will be closed

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    DestKoder
